# Aberrant Flesh
A shambling mass of flesh, animated by anomalous energy. Although the anomaly that created them has long vanished, these creatures are resilient enough to survive on their own. Not much is known about their life cycle or biological makeup; however, it is clear that they will attack and attempt to assimilate any biological life forms and will attack anything they consider a threat.
For the most part, aberrant flesh monsters utilize brute force and numerical advantage to eliminate threats. However, some of them have developed means of inflicting damage from a distance.
Can be butchered for meat.

[color=#a4885c]Flier[/color]: creature levitates above the ground and can bypass low obstacles such as tables, machine frames, or railings without being blocked or slowed down.

# "Horror"
Tougher and more resilient than the average aberrant flesh monster, the aberrant flesh horror possesses sharp bone protrusions and highly developed musculature, allowing it to rend the flesh of its victims and tear through armor with efficiency.

# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]aberrant flesh horror[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain number of [color=#a4885c]assimilation sacks[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward. [bold][color=#a4885c]Do note[/color][/bold]: each assimilation sack has a chance to spawn a small amount of aberrant flesh monsters periodically.
